actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-672.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 240 - 170 (Record Vote No: 218).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6862) to reduce budget authority and outlays under certain civil service programs pursuant to the first concurrent resolution on the budget--fiscal year 1983.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6862 (Civil service budget reduction).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6862) to reduce budget authority and outlays under certain civil service programs pursuant to the first concurrent resolution on the budget--fiscal year 1983.
